p: The anonymized data of imported and autochthonous dengue cases reported in China for 2005â€“2015 were obtained from the China Public Health Science Data Centre ( www.phsciencedata.cn). Dengue case who travelled to a dengue endemic foreign country within 15 days prior to the onset of illness was classified as imported [ 27]. As some cases in border regions might import to China via land travel, we excluded cases reported from cities without an airport in border areas of Yunnan, Guangxi, Tibet and Xinjiang province bordering SEA countries (Fig A in S1 Appendix).
